relevant_patterns.description: Applying the MVC pattern can improve the separation of concerns and make the system more maintainable.

relevant_patterns.pattern: Use a search library to improve search functionality
relevant_patterns.description: Using a search library can improve the performance and accuracy of the search results.

relevant_patterns.pattern: Use RESTful APIs for product details and reviews
relevant_patterns.description: Using RESTful APIs can improve the scalability and flexibility of the system.

suggestions.rationale: Faceted search can improve the user's ability to find products that match their search criteria.
Caching can improve the performance of the search results and reduce the load on the system.

compliance_notes: Ensure compliance with GDPR regulations for user data
Implement accessibility features to comply with WCAG 2.1 standards
integration_recommendations: Integrate with social media platforms for user authentication
Integrate with payment gateways for secure payment processing
